name: Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne
description: For Blizzard's downloader (or the downloaded installer) for Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne. A retail CD version of Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne should also work.
notes:
- An installed version of Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos is required to install this expansion set.
- Ingame videos are disabled (by adding a "TFT" suffix to the /Movies/ folder name) to avoid a possible crash. You can try to revert this and see if the movies play on your system.
- Although the installer fails on asking for the cd-keys on first launch of the game it will ask for the cd-keys without failure. If the cd-key window is blank just moved it out of screen bounds and move it back in. Some rendering issues.

files.setup: N/A:Select the installer for Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne

task.description: Installing Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup: 'N/A:Select the installer for Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne'
- patch: http://ftp.blizzard.com/pub/war3x/patches/pc/War3TFT_127a_English.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Warcraft III/Frozen Throne.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: 'Installing Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne'
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: warcraft-iii-reign-of-chaos
system: {}
wine:
  dxvk: false
  overrides:
    d3d12: disabled
    nvapi: disabled
    nvapi64: disabled
